argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_hmopadj | |- ( T e. HrmOp -> ( adjh ` T ) = T ) |
| 2 |  | #P_dmadjop | |- ( T e. dom adjh -> T : ~H --> ~H ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ ( adjh ` T ) = T ) -> T : ~H --> ~H ) |
| 4 |  | #P_adj1 | |- ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( ( adjh ` T ) ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) ) -> ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( ( adjh ` T ) ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ ( adjh ` T ) = T ) /\ ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) ) -> ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( ( adjh ` T ) ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( ( adjh ` T ) = T -> ( ( adjh ` T ) ` x ) = ( T ` x ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( adjh ` T ) = T -> ( ( ( adjh ` T ) ` x ) .ih y ) = ( ( T ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ ( adjh ` T ) = T ) /\ ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) ) -> ( ( ( adjh ` T ) ` x ) .ih y ) = ( ( T ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ ( adjh ` T ) = T ) /\ ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) ) -> ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( T ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ralrimivva | |- ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ ( adjh ` T ) = T ) -> A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( T ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_elhmop | |- ( T e. HrmOp <-> ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( T ` x ) .ih y ) ) ) |
| 13 | 3, 11, 12 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( T e. dom adjh /\ ( adjh ` T ) = T ) -> T e. HrmOp ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_ex | |- ( T e. dom adjh -> ( ( adjh ` T ) = T -> T e. HrmOp ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_impbid2 | |- ( T e. dom adjh -> ( T e. HrmOp <-> ( adjh ` T ) = T ) ) |
